author: IBM Technology
description:
Ready to become a certified watsonx Data Lakehouse Engineer? Register now and use code IBMTechYT20 for 20% off of your exam → https://ibm.biz/Bdbhiv

What if AI could write your SQL for you? 🤖 Michael Dobson explains how AI and Text‑to‑SQL use LLMs, schema understanding, and data analytics to turn natural language into powerful queries. Discover how this technology is changing the way we access and analyze data.

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://ibm.biz/Bdbhia

title: AI & Text to SQL: How LLMs & Schema Power Data Analytics
